title: Schema for an Open Contracting Release Package
description: Note that all releases within a release package must have a unique releaseID within this release package.

links.title: Pagination Links
links.description: An API can return huge amount of data that HTTP can't handle. There is a way to set the MAX amount of data displayed at a time and traverse to the next set just like browsing an HTTP UI Page.

prev.title: prev
prev.description: The previous URI of the previous set of api data.

self.title: self
self.description: The current URI of the current set of api data.

next.title: next
next.description: The next URI of the next set api data.
